title: ![Logo HMS](https://historicalmetallurgy.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Logo120.png){height=60px}
text:
Important dates



31 March – Deadline for abstracts (there won’t be any extension!)
10 April – Announcement of abstracts decisions
20 April – Deadline for registrations
21 April – Reminder with meeting details send to participants
22 April – Research in Progress Meeting
14 May – Attendance certificates sent to presenters




The Historical Metallurgy Society cordially invites you to their Research in Progress Meeting 2023 on Saturday, 22nd April, 2023 held online via Zoom free of charge.
Submit abstract
Registration




The meeting will have a code of conduct.



The meeting is organised by Thomas Rose. Please write him for any inquiries about the meeting.

title: About
text:
Privacy
This webpage does not use any cookies. It does not collect, store or process personal data. The website is hosted by GitHub Inc. using GitHub pages. The privacy statement of Github is available here.
